first.title: RSS Tracker
first.subtitle: A service for collaboration and organization of processes. Control tasks with a single tool.

1.title: All working information is always at hand
1.subtitle: Instantly assess the status of the work, determine further actions and do everything necessary to ensure that the work goes according to plan.

2.title: Everything is exactly on time
2.subtitle: Create a plan showing the relationships between the different parts of the project. It will help you work on schedule.

3.title: Chronology
3.subtitle: Manage tasks that depend on each other, overlap and unforeseen, as well as create realistic plans.

4.title: Wood boards
4.subtitle: Make sure that nothing distracts employees from their current tasks. Break down the work into stages that allow you to see what is important and where delays occur.

5.title: List
5.subtitle: In the lists, employees immediately see what needs to be done, which tasks are prioritized and what time is allotted for the work.
